columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the workplace role.

columns.name: permissions
columns.description: The list of permissions associated with the workplace role.

columns.name: identifier
columns.description: The unique identifier for the workplace role.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The timestamp when the workplace role was created.

columns.name: is_custom_role
columns.description: Indicates whether the role is a custom role.

columns.name: is_inline_role
columns.description: Indicates whether the role is an inline role.
